from bambu import navigation


[docs]class EnquiriesMenuBuilder(navigation.MenuBuilder):

[docs]	def register_partials(self):
		return (
			{
				'name': 'enquiries',
				'description': 'Adds a link to the Enquiries page'
			},
		)
	


[docs]	def add_to_menu(self, name, items, **kwargs):
		items.append(
			{
				'url': ('enquiry',),
				'title': u'Contact us',
				'selection': 'enquiry',
				'order': 99
			}
		)


navigation.site.register(EnquiriesMenuBuilder)
